page.description: Class to search and replace html elements and attributes.

methodref.name: AddTagAttributeFilter
methodref.description: Adds a tag attribute filter.

methodref.name: AddTagPairFilter
methodref.description: Replace an entire tag pair (beginning/end) that matches tag and/or crlf separated list of <attrib>=<pattern>.

methodref.name: AddTagPairMarkup
methodref.description: Add rule to replace generate markups (replace inline markup & saves mapping).

methodref.name: AddTagPairRunFilter
methodref.description:
Replace an a run of matching tag pairs (i.e. group

tags that have a common class name).

methodref.name: Addresource
methodref.description: Add a resource.

methodref.name: CombineDuplicateAttributes
methodref.description: Combine attributes that have been duplicated in a tag.

methodref.name: CountMarkupReplacement
methodref.description: Returns the number of markups done.

methodref.name: Deleteresource
methodref.description: Delete a resource.

methodref.name: ExplicitImageTagSizing
methodref.description: Forces html processor to include IMG tag width & height (loads the post-processed image , may cost some time - optimized for file: protocol).

methodref.name: ExtractTagAttributes
methodref.description: Return list of attributes (in format) from only tags in comma separated tagname list.

methodref.name: ExtractTags
methodref.description: Return only tags in comma separated tagname list.

methodref.name: GetMarkupReplacement
methodref.description: Returns the markup replacement for tag #.

methodref.name: GetTagInnerHTML
methodref.description: Get index element matching tag (returns blank if no inner html).

methodref.name: GetTagOuterHTML
methodref.description: Get index element matching tag (returns blank if no inner html).

methodref.name: Insertresource
methodref.description: Insert a new resource.

methodref.name: Moveresource
methodref.description: Move a block of resource items.

methodref.name: ProcessHTML
methodref.description: Apply html edit rules to html.

methodref.name: ProcessHTMLResources
methodref.description: Process html to convert ANY resources (images, optionally style sheets etc), into a standalone resource list (returned in resource array).

methodref.name: ProcessJavascriptExample
methodref.description: Create javascript markup (colorize using classes).

methodref.name: ProcessSVGResources
methodref.description: Process html to convert ANY embedded SVG tags into embedded background tags.

methodref.name: ProcessXbasicExample
methodref.description: Create Html for xbasic (colorize using classes).

methodref.name: RemoveBlockTags
methodref.description: Assumes 'pre' rules for spacing, but removes tags from html

methodref.name: RemoveSpans
methodref.description: Remove spans from html.

methodref.name: SetHighlighter
methodref.description: Adds a highlighter.

methodref.name: SetJavascriptFunctionReplace
methodref.description: Register expression for doing javascript function replacements.

methodref.name: SetXbasicFunctionReplace
methodref.description: Register expression for doing xbasic function replacements.

methodref.name: TerminateEscapedCharacters
methodref.description: Force termination on escaped characters.
